videos.title: African Cuisine: Food Activism in NC
videos.description: Food activist Njathi Kabui argues for why food should be an integral part of the museum experience.

videos.title: Palm Sangria Inspired by Lines That Link Humanity
videos.description: Mixologist Ernest Gantz creates a drink inspired by Lines That Link Humanity and Ghanan culture.

videos.title: Get to Know Ceramic Artist Magdalene Odundo (UK, Kenya)
videos.description: Odundo talks about how her travels have encouraged her to make art and learn about cultures.

videos.title: Get to Know Sculptor Ledelle Moe (South Africa)
videos.description: Moe discusses the challenges she has faced as an artist.

videos.title: Get to Know Carver Lamidi Fakeye (Nigeria)
videos.description: Learn about how Fakeye's artwork is a bridge between the past, present, and future.

videos.title: Found Materials in Kenya
videos.description: Visual artist Cyrus Kiburu talks about found materials in his work. This video is part of the series Afripedia.

videos.title: Dancing in Nairobi
videos.description: Listen to the voice of Anto Neosoul as they bring dance to the streets of Kenya. This video is part of the series Afripedia.

videos.title: Self-expression Using Photography
videos.description: Watch as Delphine Diallo uses photography to express herself. This video is part of the series Afripedia.
